page.description: Update a named ranges contents using JSON array of objects, arranged using the supplied columnnames. If column names are not supplied, then the first record is used to generate the column names.
page.prototype: UpdateNamedRangeJSON as L(namedrange as C,values as C[, columnNames as C])
page.example: dim gs as helper::GoogleSheet gs.namedresource= "<namedresource>" gs.spreadsheet= "<spreadsheetid>" ? gs.UpdateNamedRangeJSON("HISCORE","[{score:1000}]") ? gs.UpdateNamedRangeJSON("LEADERBOARD","[{score:1000},{score:800},{score:750}]")
